PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Extended Footage: https://youtu.be/0lWPHbr8ZNs?si=hiTFVbrA1wJr5Bx6
Help Alira
Early Levelling (Basically Rolling Magma until 31)
- Start with Templar Mule - ^x7070FFRolling Magma-Elemental Proliferation^7 + ^x7070FFFlame Wall^7 until level 31 - Buy ^x70FF70Sniper^7^x70FF70's Mark ^7at 4 - Look for Goat's Horns in Ledge or from Nessa if colours are good can purchase - Take ^x8888FF^x7070FFAdded Lightning^7^7 as Prison Reward and level in offhand for much later when you would use - Buy ^x7070FFCombustion^7 at 8 - Flame Dash at Level 10 - Equip ^x70FF70Precision^7 as needed - Equip ^x7070FFClarity^7 if you are bad at flask management. I probably wouldn't level this above level 5 early on - Take ^x7070FFSummon Skitterbots^7 as level 16 quest reward
Power Siphon Swap (31) - Complete Library Quest - Acquire Bench Craft Recipe for Flat Lightning Damage from Lunaris Temple Level 2 (you will craft this on 2 rings as a prefix, and probably on your weapon. Also unlock Solaris 2 just in case you want to craft Flat Fire Damage on a weapon instead).
Purchase the following gems to be linked as such ^x7070FFPower Siphon^7 - ^x7070FF^x70FF70Locus Mines^7^7 - ^x7070FFCharged Mines^7 - ^x70FF70Swift Assembly^7 OR ^x8888FFAdded Lightning Damage^7 ^x7070FFAutomation^7 - Detonate Mines wath alex having his settlement finished Optional Purchase ^xE05030Shield Charge^7 - ^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7 - ^x70FF70Momentum^7
The gem setup doesn't change much other than adding arrogance later once you find yourself able to also run Wrath (reservation dependent). I would always have skitterbots. Grace/Wrath during campaign is mostly player preference. Have all auras setup by maps obviously.
